Genoa, April 23th - 🅶🅴🅽🅾🅰 🅵🅻🅰🅶 🅵🅴🆂🆃🅸🆅🅰🅻 - The series of events for the Festa della Bandiera (Flag Festival), which celebrates the Genoese banner 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿, will kick off April 22th. In fact, at 6:30pm CET the flag of San Giorgio will be unrolled from the facade of the Liguria Region.However, the actual party will take place on Saturday April 23th 2022, starting at 3.45 pm CET, at the Doge's Palace: the main local authorities will be present, including the Mayor of Genoa Marco Bucci, and 𝕻𝖗𝖎𝖓𝖈𝖊 𝕬𝖑𝖇𝖊𝖗𝖙 𝕴𝕴 𝖔𝖋 𝕸𝖔𝖓𝖆𝖈𝖔, who will receive the ʜᴏɴᴏʀᴀʀʏ ᴄɪᴛɪᴢᴇɴꜱʜɪᴘ ᴏꜰ ɢᴇɴᴏᴀ and will discover the commemorative plaque in the hall of the Minor Council, an act that underlines the historical link between Genoa and Monaco.The new Ambassadors of Genoa (AGW) https://lnkd.in/dVNUKwqH will also be appointed in the wonderful Sala del Maggior Consiglio of Palazzo Ducale:👉 the Genoese Maria Elena Bottazzi nominated for the Nobel Peace Prize https://lnkd.in/d_dk6ych,👉 the Ligurian Andrea Fiumicelli, CEO Dedalus,👉 the Ligurian former footballer Sebastiano Nela https://lnkd.in/dVbkm-PD,👉 the Genoese actress Alice Arcuri,👉 the Genoese journalist Giorgia Cenni,👉 the Genoese journalist and writer Antonio Bigotti👉 the Genoese dancer Jacopo Belussi https://lnkd.in/dZsDB8SNThe ROSE OF GENOA will be given to Vitaly Tarasenko https://lnkd.in/dSH9kSnX, founder and priest of the Genoese Orthodox community of Santo Stefano, as a demonstration of the closeness to the Ukrainian community.🆅🅸🅳🅴🅾 🆁🅴🅲🅾🆁🅳🅸🅽🅶April 23th 2022Genoa's Flag Festival Cerimony@ https://lnkd.in/dwjq_Zv2hashtag#Genova hashtag#Genoa hashtag#FlagFestival hashtag#FestaDellaBadiera
